content.en: Multi-objective optimization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the efficiency and performance of multi-objective evolutionary algorithms in many-objective optimization. They have investigated various algorithms, such as Dominance Tree, Dominance- and decomposition-based approaches, and Parameterless Penalty Rule-Based Fitness Estimation, to enhance convergence, diversity, and selection pressure. These algorithms aim to strike a balance between these factors and improve the overall performance of evolutionary algorithms in solving complex optimization problems.
content.da: Multiobjektoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af multiobjektive evolutionære algoritmer i mangeobjektoptimering. De har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer, såsom Dominanstræ, dominans- og dekompositionsbaserede tilgange og parameterfri strafregelbaseret fitnessestimering, for at forbedre konvergens, diversitet og selektionspres. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at balancere disse faktorer og forbedre den samlede ydeevne af evolutionære algoritmer i løsningen af komplekse optimeringsproblemer.
